ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.title: Mekanism[--通用机械--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.title: Big Reactor[--大型反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.subti: Construct a Fission Reactor[--建造裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.descr: The &bFission Reactor&r is a multiblock that &6generates a massive amount of heat&r, as well as some other byproducts. &cRead the entire next three quests before starting it.&r The Fission Reactor is &lincredibly&r dangerous, you may want to test in a creative world as well.[--&b裂变反应堆&r是一个多方块结构,可以&6产生大量热量&r以及一些其他副产物.&c在开始之前阅读所有之后的3次任务.&r裂变反应堆&l可能很危险&r,你可能还想要在创造世界中测试.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.title: Radiation is Just Spicy Air[--辐射只是辣味空气--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.descr: &cRadiation&r can leak into the environment if certain things happen:[--如果发生某些事情,&c辐射&r会泄漏到环境中:--]
• Reactor meltdown\\n• Reactor running while full of Waste\\n• Breaking any block containing radioactive materials[--• 反应堆熔融\\n• 反应堆在满是废料时运行\\n• 破坏任何含有辐射材料的方块--]
These materials are radioactive:\\n• Nuclear Waste (obviously)\\n• Polonium Pellets\\n• Plutonium Pellets\\n• Spent Nuclear Waste[--这些材料是放射性的:\\n• 核废料(当然)\\n• 丸\\\n• 钚丸\\\n• 使用过的核废料--]

Radioactive Waste is a gas that can be stored in &bRadioactive Waste Barrels&r. In fact, that's the &oonly&r place they can be stored. &6Shift-right click one&r to see how full it is.[--放射性废料是一种气体,可以存储在&b放射性废料桶&r中. 实际上,这是它们可以存储的&o&r的地方.&6Shift-rick 1&r来查看它是否满.--]

Waste Barrels will &6delete Waste at 1mB per second&r. As such, it's best to make a lot them. Environmental radiation also dissipates over time, but &cover a much longer period&r (50 in-game days). You &ccannot safely move them&r by any means.[--废料桶会&6以每秒1mB&r的速度删除废料&r.因此,最好做大量.随着时间的推移,环境辐射也会消失,但&覆盖更长的时间&r(50个游戏中)。你&c不能通过任何方式安全移动它们&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.subti: Hazardous Environment Suit[--危险环境套装--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.descr: The &bHazmat suit&r will &6insulate you from environmental radiation&r when worn.[--&b防辐射套装&r会&6给你免疫环境辐射&r.--]
The more you wear, the more protected you are. Frankly, it isn't even worth wearing only some of it without the rest.[--你穿得越多,保护得越多。说真的,如果没有其他东西,它甚至不值得佩戴其中的一部分。--]
Note, you are &cnot fully protected&r, just mostly.[--注意,你&c没有完全保护&r,只是大多数.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.title: Radical[--富集--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.subti: Not great, not terrible[--不棒,不坏--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.descr: When used, the &bGeiger Counter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Exposure&r where you are. Normal, safe background levels are aroung 100 nSv/h, &mwhatever those are&r.[--使用时,&b盖革计数器&r会&6告诉你你当前辐射照射&r的位置.普通情况下,安全背景等级是 100nSv/h,&m不管这些是&r.--]
The &bDosimeter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Dose&r. Basically, how irradiated you yourself are.[--&b量子仪&r会&6告诉你你当前的辐射服&r.基本上,你自己如何受到辐射.--]
Obviously, higher numbers are worse. Green is safe, yellow is unsafe, orange is dangerous, and red is critical.[--很显然,数字越高越好。绿色是安全的,黄色是不安全的,橙色是危险的,红色很关键。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.title: Splitting the Atom[--分解原子--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.subti: Learn how to use the Fission Reactor[--学习如何使用裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.descr: The Fission Reactor &cdoesn't make FE&r, it makes &oheat&r. This heat is used to make Steam, which turns a &6Turbine&r, which makes FE.[--裂变反应堆&c不会产生FE&r,它会产生&o热量&r.这种热量用于产生蒸汽,会转换&6涡轮机&r,产生FE.--]
Coolant can be either Water or Sodium. Water is simpler, but Sodium is more efficient (and therefore safer).[--冷却剂可以是水或钠。水更简单,但钠更高效(因此更安全)。--]

• &6Burn Rate&r is how fast fuel is being used\\n• &6Heating Rate&r is how fast coolant is being heated\\n• &6Temp&r is temperature. Temperatures above 1200K (926°C) &cdamages the Reactor&r\\n• &6Damage&r shows how close the Reactor is to a &cMeltdown&r, which causes a massive explosion and causes lethal radiation in a 5 chunk radius\\n• &6Activate&r turns it on, &6Scram&r turns it off[--•&6燃烧速率&r是使用燃料的速度\\n•&6加热速率&r是加热的\\n•&6Temp&r是温度。温度超过1200K(926°C)&c伤害反应堆&r\\\n•&6伤害&r显示反应堆离&c灭火&r的距离,在5个区块半径\\\n&6激活&r时会产生大爆炸并造成致命辐射,&6加速&r将其关闭--]

At the bottom of the &6Statistics&r tab, you can set the &6Burn Rate Limit&r - that is, how fast fuel is burned. Higher Burn Limits mean higher temperatures and higher Heating Rates.[--在&6统计&r选项卡的底部,你可以设置&6燃烧速率限制&r - 即燃料燃烧的速度。高燃烧限制指更高的温度和更高的加热速率.--]
&cBe warned&r: If the Heating Rate outpaces your ability to pump in Coolant, your Reactor will quickly overheat![--&c警告&r:如果加热速率超过你泵入冷却剂的能力,你的反应堆会快速过热!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.subti: LASER, Caution LASER, Caution[--低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.descr: The &bLaser&r uses FE to shoot out a beam from its front end.[--&b激光&r使用FE从它的前端发射光束.--]
The Laser beam will damage any mob it touches, lighting them on fire. It will also mine blocks.[--激光束会伤害它接触的任何生物,点燃它们。它也会挖矿方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests6.descr: The &bLaser Amplifier&r can accept Laser beams from 5 of its sides, store their energy, then shoot it out the front.[--&b激光放大器&r可以接受5面的激光束,存储能量,然后从前面射出.--]
In its GUI, you can set the &6minimum FE required&r to fire, as well as the &6maximum amount it can fire at once&r.[--在其GUI中,你可以设置&6最小FE需要&r来开火,以及&6一次发射的最大数量&r.--]
You can also set a &6Delay&r in ticks. The laser will emit for a short pulse, then wait the time set by the delay, then repeat.[--您也可以在tick中设置&6缓存&r. 激光会发出短脉冲,然后等待延迟设置的时间,然后重复.--]

If the Amplifier is &6not emitting&r the laser, other laser inputs are directly converted to stored FE. You can &6extract&r this with a Universal Cable configured to Pull. Other mods' cables will not work.[--如果增幅器&6不发射&r激光,其他激光输入会直接转换为存储FE.你可以使用配置为拉线的&6提取&r.其他mods的电缆不会工作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests7.descr: The &bFusion Reactor&r is a rather complex multiblock, capable of generating extremely high amounts of FE.[--&bFusion反应堆&r是一个相当复杂的多方块结构,可以产生极高的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]

Once it's built, power it with &6Deuterium&r and &6Tritium&r, and &6jumpstart it with a Laser&r aimed at the Focus Matrix! It costs a burst of &6400 MFE&r to jumpstart, so make sure you're ready![--建造后,用&6氘&r和&6泰灵星&r为它供电,然后&6用激光启动,然后用聚焦矩阵启动!它需要&6400MFE&r来启动,所以确保你准备好了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.subti: Steel Casings at last![--钢机壳最终!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.descr: &bSteel Casings&r are the basis of most of the mod's machines.[--&b钢机壳&r是mod大多数机器的基础.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.subti: Aren't we starting with frames!?[--我们不是从框架开始的吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.descr: One of the few mods where you actually need a machine to make Machine Casings.[--在几个mod中,你真的需要一个机器来制作机器外壳。--]
The &bMetallurgic Infuser&r is used to &6create alloys&r, most importantly being Steel.[--&b冶金灌注机&r用于&6制造合金&r,最重要的就是钢.--]
HINT: You dont actually need power to run this machine. You can power it with Redstone Dust in its power slot instead.[--HINT:你真的不需要电力来运行这台机器。你可以在它的电槽中用红石粉为它供电。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.subt: Rich, Richer, Enrichment[--富集,富集,富集--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.desc: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r certain items, as well as &6refine ores&r... if you can get any.[--&b富集仓&r用于&6压缩&r某些物品,以及&6精炼矿石&r......如果你有的话.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.subt: First of many[--&2许多中的第一个--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.desc: With some Redstone and Iron you can finally start making some &bInfused Alloys&r.[--用一些红石和铁,你最终可以开始制作一些&b灌注合金&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.subt: Shiny Blue things[--闪闪发光的蓝色东西--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.desc: &bReinforced Alloy&r are the next tier of Mekanism alloys.[--&b强化合金&r是下一级通用机械合金.--]
It is very suggested to use the &6Enrichment Chamber&r to get the most out of your infusing materials.[--非常建议使用&6富集室&r来获得你最大量的灌注材料.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.subt: Look into my beautiful Eyes[--看看我漂亮的眼睛--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.desc: The final tier of &6Mekanism&r alloys - the &bAtomic Alloy&r[--最后一级&6通用机械&r合金 - &b原子合金&r--]
They also come in a fancy &5purple&r color[--它们也有一个花哨的&5紫色&r颜色--]
I'm sure, the Lord of Darkness will approve[--我敢肯定,黑暗之王会支持的--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.subt: Circuits!? How do they work?[--电路!?它们如何工作?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.desc: Every decent Tech mod needs Circuits right? Luckily these aren't as complicated as Gregtech's.[--每个像样的科技模组都需要电路,对吗?幸运的是,这些没有Greetch's的复杂。--]
&6Mekanism&r &bCircuits&r only need a few parts and don't require a whole lot of microcrafting.[--&6通用机械&r&b传动杆&r只需要一些零件,不需要大量的微工艺.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.subt: Next down in line[--下一个排在队列下方--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.desc: &bAdvanced Control Circuits&r are used for more advanced machines.[--&b高级控制电路&r用于更高级的机器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.subt: You know the Drill[--你知道钻头--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.desc: Crafted from the previous Tier, the &bElite Control Circuits&r are the next Circuit in line.[--从上一个等级制作,&b精英控制电路&r是下一个线缆.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests17.desc: Crafting the &bUltimate Control Circuit&r will grant you access to the highest tiers of the mod.[--制作&b终极控制电路&r将允许你访问该mod的最高层.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests18.desc: Applying a &bBasic Tier Installer&r to most &eMekanism&r machines will transform them into a &6Factory&r.[--对大多数&e通用机械&r机器使用&b基础安装器&r会将其转化为&6框架&r.--]
Factories have &6multiple processing slots&r, so you can make more compact setups.[--工厂有&6多个处理插槽&r,所以你可以制作更压缩的设置.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.subt: Make an Advanced Tier Installer[--制作高级安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.desc: The &bAdvanced Tier Installer&r will convert Basic Factories to &6Advanced Factories&r, which have 5 parallel processing lines.[--&b高级安装器&r将基本工厂转换为&6高级工厂&r,具有5条并行处理线.--]
It is suggested to use &6Energy Upgrades&r to reduce the machine's energy usage.[--建议使用&6能源升级&r来减少机器的能量使用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.subt: Make an Elite Tier Installer[--制作精英安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.desc: This &bElite Tier Installer&r gives you a whopping 7 slots of processing.[--这个&b精英等级安装器&r可以给你一个7个处理插槽.--]
In addition to this, with some Speed upgrades, you can probably process all your resources with ease[--此外,通过一些速度升级,你可能可以轻松处理你的所有资源--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests21.desc: &bElite Factories&r have &69 parallel processing lines&r.[--&b精英工厂&r具有&69并行处理线&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.subt: Make a Chemical Injection Chamber[--制作化学灌注室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.desc: The next step in ore processing is the &bChemical Injection Chamber&r.[--矿石处理的下一个步骤是&b化学灌注室&r.--]
This will allow you to turn &63 Raw Ores into 8 Shards&r.[--这将允许你将&63个原矿变成8个碎片&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests23.desc: The &bCrusher&r is able to &6crush items&r.[--&b粉碎机&r可以&6粉碎物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.subt: Make a Purification Chamber[--制作一个提纯仓--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.desc: The &bPurification Chamber&r allows you to &6get more out of Raw Ores&r.[--&b提纯仓&r允许你&6得到更多原矿石&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.subt: Make a Pressurized Reaction Chamber[--制作加压反应室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.desc: With the &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r  is what gates Mekanism's &6nuclear reactors&r. Prepare yourself for what's to come.[--使用&b加压反应室&r是通用机械&6核反应堆&r的门。准备好面对未来吧。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests26.desc: The &bSolar Neutron Activator&r is used to convert one liquid into another, and is &6powered by the sun&r.[--&b太阳能中子活化器&r用于将一个液体转化为另一个,并且&6由太阳驱动&r.--]
It can convert &6Lithium into Tritium&r, as well as &6Nuclear Waste into Pollonium&r.[--它可以将&6锂转化为&r,并将&6核废料转化为&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.subt: Make a Thermal Evaporation Chamber[--制作热力蒸馏室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.desc: Using the &bThermal Evaporation Chamber&r to create Brine is one of the first steps into getting Fusion Power.[--使用&b热力蒸馏室&r来制作盐水是获得聚合力的初始步骤之一。--]
You probably want to have atleast 2 &bThermal Evaporation Chambers&r.[--你可能想要至少2个&b热力蒸馏室&r.--]

The taller the multiblock, the faster it will work. Also, you can add &6Solar Panels&r on top, or &6Resistive Heaters&r on a Valve to increase the speed even further.[--多方块越高,它就越快工作。此外,你可以在顶部添加&6太阳能电池板&r,或者在阀门上添加&6抗性加热器&r,以进一步提高速度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.subt: Don't spill your Waste![--别浪费你的废料!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.desc: In the Solar Neutron Activator, you can convert &6Nuclear Waste&r into &bPolonium&r (with a side effect of making &cSpent Nuclear Waste&r).[--在太阳能中子活化器中,你可以将&6核废料&r转化为&b钚&r(具有制造&c粉碎核废料&r的副作用)。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.subt: Have we reached Endgame yet?[--我们到达末地游戏了吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.desc: The &bMekaSuit&r is an incredibly powerful &6upgradable armor set&r.[--&bMeka套装&r是一个非常强大的&6高级盔甲套装&r.--]
Its &6Upgrade Units&r can be intalled in the &6Modification Station&r.[--它的&6升级单元&r可以在&6改造站&r中完成.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.subt: Snap back to Reality[--回到现实--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.desc: The &bSupercritical Phase Shifter&r is a multiblock that uses a large amount of FE to &6convert Polonium gas into Antimatter gas&r.[--&b超临界shifter&r是一个使用大量FE将&6气体转换为反物质气体&r的多方块结构.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests31.desc: The &bIndustrial Turbine&r is a &oreally&r complex multiblock that uses Steam to generate FE.[--&b工业涡轮机&r是一个&oreally&r复杂的多方块结构,使用蒸汽产生FE.--]
When used with Reactors, this will generate a massive amount of FE.[--当与反应堆一起使用时,这将产生大量的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests32.desc: &bGas-Burning Generators&r take much more infrastructure, but generate much more power than earlier generators.[--&b燃气发电机&r需要更多的基础设备,但发电量比早期的发电机高得多.--]
You can start off by burning &6Oxygen&r, but &6automating Ethylene&r is basically an immediate jump to the midgame.[--你可以从燃烧&6氧气&r开始,但是&6自动化乙烯&r基本上就是立即跳到游戏中。--]
